name: NSTextLayoutManager.SegmentOptions
desc: Values that describe where and how the framework extends segments of a selection.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Cceates a new segment option using the value you provide.

items.name: static var headSegmentExtended: NSTextLayoutManager.SegmentOptions
items.desc: Returns the value that causes the framework to extend the segment to the tail edge.

items.name: static var middleFragmentsExcluded: NSTextLayoutManager.SegmentOptions
items.desc: Returns the value that causes the framework to enumerate segments in only the first and last line fragments.

items.name: static var rangeNotRequired: NSTextLayoutManager.SegmentOptions
items.desc: Returns the value that causes the framework enumerate text segment rectangles, but avoids preparing a range object.

items.name: static var tailSegmentExtended: NSTextLayoutManager.SegmentOptions
items.desc: Returns the value that causes the framework to extend the segment to the tail edge.

items.name: static var upstreamAffinity: NSTextLayoutManager.SegmentOptions
items.desc: Returns the value that causes the framework to the place the segment based on the upstream affinity for an empty range.
